title: Authors and Citation
text: Çetinkaya-Rundel M, Rundel E (2023). dinosaurs: Data dinosaur species. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://github.com/mine-cetinkaya-rundel/dinosaurs.
code: @Manual{,   title = {dinosaurs: Data on dinosaur species},   author = {Mine Çetinkaya-Rundel and Elliott Rundel},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://github.com/mine-cetinkaya-rundel/dinosaurs}, }

title: Data on dinosaur species
text: goal dinosaurs provide dataset dinosaur species. package currently work progress. working collecting data https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Du5yUoZfhB4fKtmkrHUZq9dmYMgM5-Gda99fi3-A9eI.

title: Data on dinosaur species
text: can install development version dinosaurs GitHub :

title: Data on dinosaur species
code: library(dinosaurs) library(ggplot2)  ggplot(dinosaurs, aes(x = vore)) +   geom_bar() +   labs(     title = "What dinosaurs eat",     x = "Vore",     y = "Count"   )

title: Dinosaur species — dinasours
text: Numerous variables ___ species dinosaurs collected various resources.

title: Dinosaur species — dinasours
text: data frame 20 observations following 4 variables. name Name species. ecosystem Ecosystem species lives . vore Vore species: carnivore, herbivore, pescavore. name_mening Meaning species name.

title: Dinosaur species — dinasours
code: library(ggplot2)  # What dinosaurs eat ggplot(dinosaurs, aes(x = vore, fill = vore)) + geom_bar(show.legend = FALSE) +   labs(     title = "What dinosaurs eat 🦖",     x = "Vore",     y = "Count"   ) +   scale_fill_manual(values = c("firebrick1", "forestgreen")) +   theme_minimal()   # Where dinosaurs live ggplot(dinosaurs, aes(y = ecosystem, fill = ecosystem)) + geom_bar(show.legend = FALSE) +   labs(     title = "Where dinosaurs live 🌎",     y = "Ecosystem",     x = "Count"   ) +   scale_fill_manual(values = c("chocolate3", "darkseagreen2", "deepskyblue3")) +   theme_minimal()
